wikipedia_page.main: Dolores Gordon-Smith (born 1958) is a British novelist. She is best known for writing The Jack Haldean murder mysteries, the first of which, A Fête Worse than Death was published in 2007. Set in England in the 1920s, there are currently nine books in the series.  She has also written a stand-alone historical novel, Frankie's Letter, set during World War I.
